verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:31
verses.text: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice: and let men say among the nations, The Lord reigneth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:32
verses.text: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof: let the fields rejoice, and all that is therein.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:33
verses.text: Then shall the trees of the wood sing out at the presence of the Lord, because he cometh to judge the earth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:34
verses.text: O give thanks unto the Lord; for he is good; for his mercy endureth for ever.
